articles.title: Elon Musk’s AI company, xAI, releases its latest flagship model, Grok 3 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Elon Musk's AI company, xAI, released its latest flagship AI model, Grok 3, on Monday, along with new capabilities in the Grok app for iOS and the web.
articles.content:
Elon Musk’s AI company, xAI, late on Monday released its latest flagship AI model, Grok 3, and unveiled new capabilities for the Grok iOS and web apps.
Grok, xAIs answer to models like OpenAIs GPT-4… [+4796 chars]

articles.title: A Deep-Sea Telescope Just Detected the Most Energetic Ghost Particle Ever - SciTechDaily
articles.description: A neutrino of record-breaking energy — 220 PeV — has been detected by the underwater KM3NeT telescope, marking a pivotal moment in astrophysics. This tiny but powerful particle, born from the universe’s most extreme events, provides fresh clues about cosmic a…
articles.content: A record-breaking neutrino detected in the Mediterranean may hold the key to understanding the most extreme events in the universe. Could it be from a cosmic accelerator — or something even more myst… [+8476 chars]

articles.title: GTA VI PC Might Launch Early Next Year, According to Corsair - Wccftech
articles.description: Corsair Gaming CEO Andrew Paul said that GTA VI might launch on PC as early as the first months of 2026, which would be a nice surprise.
articles.content: It's no surprise that GTA VI was voted the most anticipated game of 2025 by the Wccftech community (and by many other communities in similar polls). We're talking about the sequel to the second best-… [+2745 chars]
